timeSeriesQuery.timeSeriesQueryLanguage:
fetch k8s_container
| metric 'logging.googleapis.com/byte_count'
| filter
    (resource.namespace_name == 'cnrm-system')
    || (resource.namespace_name == 'docker')
    || (resource.namespace_name == 'config-management-system')
    || (resource.namespace_name == 'gatekeeper-system')
    || (resource.namespace_name == 'gke-connect')
    || (resource.namespace_name == 'gke-system')
    || (resource.namespace_name == 'istio-system')
    || (resource.namespace_name == 'knative-serving')
    || (resource.namespace_name == 'monitoring-system')
    || (resource.namespace_name == 'kube-system')
| group_by [project_id], sum(value.byte_count)
| every 1d

fetch k8s_pod
| metric 'logging.googleapis.com/byte_count'
| filter
    (resource.namespace_name == 'cnrm-system')
    || (resource.namespace_name == 'docker')
    || (resource.namespace_name == 'config-management-system')
    || (resource.namespace_name == 'gatekeeper-system')
    || (resource.namespace_name == 'gke-connect')
    || (resource.namespace_name == 'gke-system')
    || (resource.namespace_name == 'istio-system')
    || (resource.namespace_name == 'knative-serving')
    || (resource.namespace_name == 'monitoring-system')
    || (resource.namespace_name == 'kube-system')
| group_by [project_id], sum(value.byte_count)
| every 1d

fetch k8s_node
| metric 'logging.googleapis.com/byte_count'
| filter
    (metric.log == 'container-runtime') 
    || (metric.log = 'docker')
    || (metric.log == 'kube-container-runtime-monitor')
    || (metric.log == 'kube-logrotate')
    || (metric.log == 'kube-node-configuration')
    || (metric.log == 'kube-node-installation') || (metric.log == 'kubelet')
    || (metric.log == 'kubelet-monitor') 
    || (metric.log == 'node-journal')
    || (metric.log == 'node-problem-detector')
| group_by [project_id], sum(value.byte_count)
| every 1d

text.content: Use these charts to view the GKE system log volume over time. Use the time range selector to adjust the time range.

timeSeriesQuery.timeSeriesQueryLanguage:
fetch k8s_pod
| metric 'logging.googleapis.com/byte_count'
| filter
    (resource.namespace_name == 'cnrm-system')
    || (resource.namespace_name == 'docker')
    || (resource.namespace_name == 'config-management-system')
    || (resource.namespace_name == 'gatekeeper-system')
    || (resource.namespace_name == 'gke-connect')
    || (resource.namespace_name == 'gke-system')
    || (resource.namespace_name == 'istio-system')
    || (resource.namespace_name == 'knative-serving')
    || (resource.namespace_name == 'monitoring-system')
    || (resource.namespace_name == 'kube-system')
| group_by [], [value_byte_count_aggregate_aggregate: sum(value.byte_count)]
| every 30d

fetch k8s_container
| metric 'logging.googleapis.com/byte_count'
| filter
   (resource.namespace_name == 'cnrm-system')
   || (resource.namespace_name == 'docker')
   || (resource.namespace_name == 'config-management-system')
   || (resource.namespace_name == 'gatekeeper-system')
   || (resource.namespace_name == 'gke-connect')
   || (resource.namespace_name == 'gke-system')
   || (resource.namespace_name == 'istio-system')
   || (resource.namespace_name == 'knative-serving')
   || (resource.namespace_name == 'monitoring-system')
   || (resource.namespace_name == 'kube-system')
| group_by [], sum(value.byte_count)
| every 30d

fetch k8s_node
| metric 'logging.googleapis.com/byte_count'
| filter
    (metric.log == 'container-runtime') || (metric.log = 'docker')
    || (metric.log == 'kube-container-runtime-monitor')
    || (metric.log == 'kube-logrotate')
    || (metric.log == 'kube-node-configuration')
    || (metric.log == 'kube-node-installation') || (metric.log == 'kubelet')
    || (metric.log == 'kubelet-monitor') || (metric.log == 'node-journal')
    || (metric.log == 'node-problem-detector')
| group_by [], sum(value.byte_count)
| every 30d
